summary: This bill, the "Fair Access to Co-ops for Veterans Act of 2025," aims to improve the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) loan guarantee program for veterans purchasing residential cooperative housing units. It amends Title 38 of the United States Code to clarify loan eligibility, set new regulations, address loan fees, and treat cooperative housing stock as residential property. The bill also directs the VA to advertise these loan guarantees and provides guidance for implementation.
